author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
The latest iteration of the Frankenstein story, as percolated through Guillermo del Toro’s darkly wonderful mind, is not a ‘monster movie’ and that’s a good thing. This film sticks much closer to the book than previous movies, and takes a slower approach to really appreciate the story it is trying to tell. Frankenstein (2025) is […]

The post REVIEW: Frankenstein (2025) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Frankenstein (2025)
